title: 17 Casual, Stylish Outfits to Wear to a Baseball Game

steps.title: Baseball jersey and denim or athletic shorts.
steps.content: Baseball jersey and denim or athletic shorts. Nothing’s more appropriate for a baseball game than wearing your team’s jersey! Simply style a fitted or loose jersey with your favorite pair of denim shorts for the quintessential game-day look. Or, opt for a more relaxed vibe with a pair of linen or athletic shorts. [1] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or sandals. Don’t forget to accessorize with a baseball hat, sunglasses, and your favorite jewelry!

steps.title: T-shirt and denim shorts, skort, or skirt.
steps.content: T-shirt and denim shorts, skort, or skirt. Style a casual t-shirt with a comfy pair of jean bottoms for another classic baseball game outfit. Wear a t-shirt featuring your team, like from 500 LEVEL’s MLBPA Collection , or a solid shirt in your team’s colors. Or, simply don a basic white or black tee. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or sandals.

steps.title: T-shirt or tank dress.
steps.content: T-shirt or tank dress. For a slightly dressed-up option that’s still comfy and relaxed, throw on a t-shirt or tank dress in a midi or mini length. Just choose a dress in your team’s colors, in a simple pattern, or in a solid white, black, or gray. [2] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or sandals. This is a great outfit choice if you’re catching the game after work or meeting up with a date.

steps.title: T-shirt and tennis skirt.
steps.content: T-shirt and tennis skirt. Opt for a sporty vibe by pairing a t-shirt featuring your MLBPA favorite player with a white or black pleated skirt. Either tuck the shirt in, leave it untucked, or crop it for an ultra-trendy look. Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes. [3] X Research source

steps.title: T-shirt, jersey, and jeans.
steps.content: T-shirt, jersey, and jeans. If the weather is cooler, wear a white, black, or neutral tee under your baseball team’s jersey. Simply don a pair of jeans in your favorite cut, wash, and style, whether that’s wide-leg, skinny, high-rise, or low-rise. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, loafers, or sandals.

steps.title: T-shirt, letterman jacket, and jeans.
steps.content: T-shirt, letterman jacket, and jeans. Layer a letterman jacket over a classic jeans and t-shirt combo for a super sporty vibe. A letterman jacket is the perfect transition piece for cooler days and to show off your team pride. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or loafers.

steps.title: Jumpsuit.
steps.content: Jumpsuit. Go for a more put-together look by wearing a jumpsuit in a solid neutral or in your team’s colors. Opt for a sleeveless or short-sleeved jumpsuit for the warmer months and a long-sleeved suit in the cooler months. [4] X Research source Alternatively, layer a t-shirt underneath the jumpsuit for added layering. Or, style the jumpsuit with your team’s jersey, a flannel, or a light jacket. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or loafers.

steps.title: Cropped t-shirt and biker shorts or leggings.
steps.content: Cropped t-shirt and biker shorts or leggings. Wearing athleisure is the perfect way to stay comfy and stylish as you watch a baseball game. Depending on the season, put on a pair of black or neutral biker shorts or leggings. Then, throw on a cropped t-shirt featuring your team or your team’s colors. [5] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes.

steps.title: T-shirt, button-down, and trousers.
steps.content: T-shirt, button-down, and trousers. In the cooler months, layer a button-down over a t-shirt and pants. Go for a more relaxed vibe by wearing a linen button-down with linen trousers. Or, aim for a more put-together look by choosing a structured button-down and tailored pants or jeans. Opt for a neutral look by wearing a white, brown, gray, or black top and bottom. Or, go for a monochromatic look in your team’s colors! Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or loafers.

steps.title: T-shirt, jersey, and joggers.
steps.content: T-shirt, jersey, and joggers. This ultra-casual and comfy outfit is great for transitioning to the cooler months. Simply pair a neutral cropped or regular-length t-shirt with some neutral joggers. Then, layer your baseball team’s jersey on top! Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes.

steps.title: Long-sleeved tee or sweater, leather or denim jacket, and jeans.
steps.content: Long-sleeved tee or sweater, leather or denim jacket, and jeans. Stay warm during the cooler months by wearing a long-sleeved shirt or sweater featuring your team or in their colors. Simply pair it with your favorite jeans and a leather or denim jacket for a classic and casual fit. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or boots.

steps.title: Long-sleeved tee or sweater, vest, and jeans.
steps.content: Long-sleeved tee or sweater, vest, and jeans. Elevate or relax your look in the cooler season with a vest. Opt for a fleece or sherpa vest for a more put-together fit or a puffer vest for a casual and sporty vibe. Simply style it over jeans and a long-sleeved tee or sweater. [6] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or boots.

steps.title: T-shirt or baseball jersey and fabric shorts.
steps.content: T-shirt or baseball jersey and fabric shorts. Show off your team spirit by wearing a t-shirt featuring your favorite baseball player, like one from 500 LEVEL’s MLBPA Collection . Or, wear your team’s jersey over a classic white tee. Simply style your shirt with a pair of linen or cotton shorts to stay comfortable in the warmer months. [7] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes.

steps.title: T-shirt or jersey and chinos.
steps.content: T-shirt or jersey and chinos. For a classic baseball fit that’s slightly more put together, wear your baseball shirt or jersey with a pair of chinos. Opt for shorts or pants in khaki, brown, navy blue, or gray. Shoes : Sneakers, tennis shoes, or loafers.

steps.title: White t-shirt, jersey, and jeans.
steps.content: White t-shirt, jersey, and jeans. Nothing’s more perfect for America’s favorite pastime than the all-American outfit: blue jeans and a white t-shirt. Just flaunt your team spirit by wearing an unbuttoned baseball jersey over your top. [8] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes.

steps.title: Sweatshirt and joggers.
steps.content: Sweatshirt and joggers. Look trendy while staying comfortable by throwing on a hoodie or sweatshirt over a neutral pair of joggers. Either wear a sweatshirt featuring your favorite MLBPA player or their team colors. Shoes : Sneakers or tennis shoes.

steps.title: Polo and trousers.
steps.content: Polo and trousers. Choose a polo in your team’s colors or embroidered with their logo for a more put-together look that’s perfect for a date or work event. Simply style your polo with a tailored pair of trousers in a neutral color, like khaki, brown, or navy blue. [9] X Research source Shoes : Sneakers, loafers, or boots.

steps.title: Wear casual and comfortable clothes.
steps.content: Wear casual and comfortable clothes. Baseball games are relaxed events where comfort is of the utmost importance. You’ll be doing a lot of walking, climbing, and sitting, so make sure the outfit you choose feels good on your skin and allows you to move around. [10] X Research source Choose soft, breathable, and stretchy fabrics over stiff and structured materials. Cotton, linen, chambray, and bamboo are great fabrics that don’t sacrifice style!

steps.title: Check the weather before the game.
steps.content: Check the weather before the game. Most baseball games are held outside in the late afternoon or evening, so it’s important to know what temperatures and conditions are in store. In the cooler months, bring layering pieces like flannels, cardigans, sweatshirts, and jackets to stay warm. In the warmer months, wear lightweight and breathable fabrics. [11] X Research source If rain is in the forecast, don’t forget your umbrella or raincoat!

steps.title: Wear your baseball team’s logo or colors to show off your team spirit.
steps.content: Wear your baseball team’s logo or colors to show off your team spirit. The best part of going to a baseball game is rooting for your team! Join in on the fun by wearing branded MLBPA shirts and sweaters. We love the branded apparel over at 500 LEVEL because of all their great, high-quality options. Or, you can simply throw on your team’s colors.

steps.title: Add accessories to flaunt your style.
steps.content: Add accessories to flaunt your style. While baseball games are pretty casual, that doesn’t mean you can’t look stylish! Throw on a baseball cap with your team’s logo or in a fun pop of color to look on-trend and game-day-ready. Do the same with a pair of sunglasses, a bag, or jewelry to further accessorize your look. [12] X Research source Note : Many baseball stadiums have strict policies about the size and color of the bag you can bring. Make sure you follow their rules when planning your outfit.

steps.title: Pack a hat, sunglasses, and sunscreen before heading to the game.
steps.content: Pack a hat, sunglasses, and sunscreen before heading to the game. It’s important to protect yourself from the sun as you watch the game, so make sure you at least bring a hat, sunglasses, and sunscreen. For further comfort, consider bringing: Water and snacks (if allowed) Hand wipes Insect repellant A phone battery and charger Pain reliever medicine (like acetaminophen or ibuprofen) Binoculars Handheld fan A baseball (in case you catch a ball!) A permanent marker (for an autograph from your favorite player!)
